responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "9E25DF2B4BB4E5022604C6825EAC62E5", "Why not? Listen closely, now. There is a man out there that has repeatedly pressed the limits of my colleagues\' lenience. And this time, well, he went too far. He\'s stolen quite a lot from them, and It\'s time someone sent a message. Others might think we\'ve gone soft, otherwise. Our network has turned up a clue about where this person might have hidden out. I need someone to go and roust him, find what he stole, and bring it to one of our agents. Think you can handle that?")
name: SA_0009_Gersh_Redux_22
